sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>mysterious</radical> radical and the <kanji>mysterious</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: There is no one more <kanji>mysterious</kanji> than <reading>Gen</reading>ji (<ja>げん</ja>). He's tall, dark, handsome, and most of all... <ja>〜</ja>mysterious<ja>〜</ja>!
readingInfo:
Who's the mysterious man who's always reciting poetry? Genji!
Who's the mysterious man who gets all the ladies? Genji!
Who's the mysterious man crying over there because someone turned him down? G... Genji...
